entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:57 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
